full_summary:
# Tender Notice
## Title
Title: Aircraft Spare Parts
Title in French: Pièces de rechange d'aéronef
## Tender Information
- Reference Number: CB-478-52060419
- Amendment Number: 3
- Solicitation Number: W8485-248035/B
- Date of Publication: 2024-01-17
- Closing Date for Tender: 2024-02-07 14:00:00
- Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-02-07
- Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-31
- Tender Status: Expired

## Scope of Work
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the following aircraft spare parts:
- Item 1: Lanyard Assy Survival Kit (Quantity: 50)
  - NSN: 1660-21-858-0915
  - Part Number: C68D54683
  - NCAGE: 09511
- Item 2: A Survival Item (Quantity: 40)
  - NSN: 1620-2-810-0452
  - Part Number: 6598-1
  - NCAGE: 1C762
- Item 3: Electrical Components (Quantity: 30)
  - NSN: 5940-01-357-4902
  - Part Number: M81714/60-22-01
  - NCAGE: 81349

## Tender Requirements
- All bidders must submit their proposal in English or French
- Eligibility criteria will be established in the tender documents
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement

## Contact Information
- Name: Steve Duval
- Email: steve.duvalurbain@forces.gc.ca
- Phone: (613) 292-9650
- Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A0K2, Canada

### Attachment
The tender documents are available for download from the Canada Buys website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/29582/w8485-248035-rfp-eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/29582/w8485-248035-rfp-fr\_0.pdf) (Eng), [https://canad
